title: I'm Not Around
description:
This may be the last Kirk Minihane Show ever or at least until after The Wilbur. Kirk announces he's taking a long break to focus on his health and The Case: Season 2. Bob Murchison strikes again as he interjects himself, possibly orchestrated, an entire hit-piece on Dave Portnoy with Business Insider. The story was riddled with falsehoods and in true journalistic fashion, not one Business Insider representative has been willing to discuss the piece.


You can find every episode of this show on Apple Podcasts, Spotify or YouTube. Prime Members can listen ad-free on Amazon Music. For more, visit barstool.link/kminshow
dc:creator: Barstool Sports
